> <OLD - Nightlight>
>
> Nightlight tried to control her fear and while she tried to show confidence
> she said "You are very kind, milord, asking for my opinion; I know my
> husband enough to say that he will be very thankful allowing me remain at
> his side and this will double his effor to fight against your enemies"
>
> She hoped that she had told the right words.

There was a sputtered chuckle from SABERBACK, "You know your husband
well do you?"

MAGMATRON gave SABERBACK a baleful look which caused him to back up a
step and nod, "Yes, of course my lord." he said as he lapsed into
silence.

DARK RODIMUS just glared at SABERBACK as he kept his protective stance
in front of NIGHTLIGHT.

Turning back to NIGHTLIGHT, MAGMATRON's optics brightened with some
strange inner emotion, "I am sure that your Rodimus will redouble his
efforts to fight against all my enemies."

MAGMATRON looked down at a small viewscreen on his chair, one that
only he, and perhaps SABERBACK, could see from its angle. "Now this
makes for an interesting wrinkle." he said with a touch of humor. "I
do believe we have some would be rescuers trying to make their way
in."

SABERBACK glanced down at the image a smile blookming on his face. "It
looks as if Grimlock is handling it well so far."

Smiling MAGMATRON turned to look at DARK RODIMUS and NIGHTLIGHT, "Now,
how can we turn up the heat on all this?" He snapped his fingers, "I
know, we can let the Maximals know where they think they can find
you."

MAGMATRON turned to one of the soldiers that was standing near the
door. "Tell Guiledart that it is time." He pulled a small device out
of one of the input slots of his throne (OOC: Looks somethng like a
USB Drive) and threw it over to the soldier. "He will know what do
do."

The soldier caught the device and nodded and quickly left.

Standing MAGMATRON looked down at NIGHTLIGHT, "Now to consider what to
do with you."

(TAG)

Preston
